com.milk.command
Interface CommandListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandPanel.MyCommandListener, JCommandableMenu.MyCommandListener
public interface CommandListener
extends java.util.EventListener

This is the interface for objects that care about CommandEvents.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.

          This is called when the label changes.
